classes.cCustomNote: Choose one of the following: BOT121, BIO114.

One course from each of the following GE areas must be completed: A1, A2, A3, B3, C1, C2, C4, D1, D2, D3, D5, and F. C4, D5, and F should be taken only after Junior standing is reached (90 units). Refer to online catalog for GE course selection and Graduation Writing Requirement (GWR). USCP requirement can be satisfied by some (but not all) courses within GE categories: C4, D1, D3, D4, D5, or F.

Choose one of the following: LA221, AEPS381.

Select five courses from the following Integrated Learning Course (ILC) topics: LA 431, 432, 433, 434, 435, 436, 437, 438, 439. At least three (3) different ILCs must be chosen. (ILCs are repeatable to 12 units). Select only one Focus Studio course each quarter to be taken concurrently with an Integrated Learning Course (ILC).

Select five courses from the following Integrated Learning Course (ILC) topics: LA 431, 432, 433, 434, 435, 436, 437, 438, 439. At least three (3) different ILCs must be chosen. (ILCs are repeatable to 12 units). Select only one Focus Studio course each quarter to be taken concurrently with an Integrated Learning Course (ILC).
Select two courses from the following: BIO 227, BRAE 337, SS 121, STAT 217 or 218.

Students can attempt to fulfill the requirement after 90 earned units; students should complete the requirement before senior year. Any GWR class or GWR exam can go here. Refer to current catalog for prerequisites.
